name: Level Info
description: A QoL mod that displays stats about levels

text-color.name: Text color
text-color.description: The color in which the text is displayed

show-requested-stars.name: Requested Stars
show-requested-stars.description: Displays the star difficulty requested by the creator

show-featured-rank.name: Featured Rank
show-featured-rank.description: Displays the featured rank of the level

show-object-count.name: Object Count
show-object-count.description: Indicates how many objects are in the level

show-two-player-mode.name: 2 Player mode
show-two-player-mode.description: Indicates if the level is using 2 player mode

show-game-version.name: Game Version
show-game-version.description: Display the game version in which the level was posted

show-level-version.name: Level Version
show-level-version.description: Displays the current version of a level
